direction.raw_text: . INT. MARTIAL'S MERCEDES. DAY CU on a long cut behind Ali's ear. Stephanie's fingers use a Kleenex instead of cotton. Bare-chested with a towel around his neck, Ali leans forward to make his wound more easily accessible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's nothing, just a cut. (to Martial) Got anything to disinfect it with?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (driving) No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Ali) Keep this on it. It's the only one I have. Ali looks up at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You liked it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too. He again lowers his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put this on it. It's the only one I have. Ali straightens up, covers himself with the towel and remains like that: invisible, out of breath, clearing his throat and spitting out the window... Stephanie observes the welts on his body. A big service station appears a bit farther down the road. Ali sits back up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull over here. I'll go rinse off my face. (puts out his hand) Give me 50. Martial uses his turn signal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MARTIAL'S MERCEDES. DAY Behind the wheel of his stopped car, Martial counts the bills spread out on his lap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you known him for long?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, not very. Alone in the back seat, Stephanie looks out at the service station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want to know? If I knew him before the accident? Martial looks back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You find it weird that we're together? You wonder what he's doing with me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, since you know him, I just wanted to know if you've seen him like that before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Martial finishes counting the bills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He freaks me out. He takes his share and hands Stephanie the envelope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: for him. She looks at the envelope without taking it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you giving me that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's for Ali.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly. So why give it to me? He looks at her, suddenly surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you make it complicated. Either you take it or you don't. And either I talk or I keep my mouth shut. He tosses the envelope at her. She looks away. Ali finally gets back into the car with a big box. It's a toy: a green John Deere tractor with all the accessories.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For my kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a kid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. BEACH - ROAD. DAY The afternoon sun has the entire coast sparkling. Ali is on his moped, with the box between his knees, driving up the coastal road. He looks splendid, wearing new clothes. He finally sees what he was looking for: a group on the beach, Anna, Richard and their neighbors, having a picnic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. BEACH. DAY CU Ali and Anna are off to one side, talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see what you're like with him? You're not around and when you are, you scream at him. Damn, you hit him! Why did you take him along if you act like that? You should have left him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut the shit. He's not dead. I didn't do it on purpose. I'm sorry about it. Anna avoids his glance. He rummages in his pocket, pulls out the envelope of money and hands it to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Money. What I owe you plus the next few
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: months. You can count it. She looks at the bills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get this? (pointing to his new clothes) Same place?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won a fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A fight? What kind of fight? Is that the only job you could find? Is that why you have marks on your face?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, will you take the money or not? Why are you looking at me that way?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. He leaves her with the envelope and trots over to the rest of the group. They are packing away ice chests and folding things up. Sam and his little friends are playing in the sand with the John Deere tractor. Sam has a bandage on his forehead. Ali sits down in the sand next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pointing to the tractor) You like it? Sam continues to play, ignoring him. Behind them, Richard is folding up parasols with the help of Che, a bearded neighbor who is also there with all his family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you eaten?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to drink something before I 66 pack up? Ali shakes his head a no'. He looks at Joelle, Che's daughter: a tomboy with boobs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Sam) You want to go for a swim?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. BEACH. DAY Ali and JoAlle take turns tossing Sam into the waves. The child laughs so hard, he swallows water. Ali takes Sam into his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give Daddy a kiss!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (using a deep voice) Give Daddy a kiss!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (deep voice too)... No! Ali kisses him and hugs him tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. JOELLE'S ROOM. EVENING A nearby house. Evening is falling. Ali and JoAlle make love in her bedroom. His cell phone rings. The screen reads: "Stef". He doesn't answer. JoAlle comes noisily. Ali puts his hand over her mouth. Through the window, we see Sam in Anna's garden, playing with his new tractor. Richard is hanging towels and swim suits on the line to dry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT. EVENING Sitting on the couch in a T-shirt and boxers, Stephanie finishes her dinner, watching TV distractedly. Balancing on her stumps, she puts her plate in the dishwasher. Then, supporting herself on her hands, she leaves the kitchen, wiggling her way into the bedroom. She lifts herself into bed as best she can. Evening falls over the bougainvilleas. Stephanie watches old people coming home in their wheelchairs or hanging on to their Zimmer frames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. FORMULE 1 - HOTEL ROOM. DAY Ali walks up a long standard hotel corridor lined with numbered doors. He stops and knocks at room 429. No answer. He knocks again. Finally, room 431 opens behind him. Martial looks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! I'm here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They told me 429. Martial motions him in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Normal. This one is for the equipment. Boxes of equipment are piled up under the window and the small table has been converted into a work surface. A camera is plugged into the TV set. It shows a still picture: an empty location, one sector of an industrial site filmed from above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to watch this. Have a seat. You wanted to see me. Ali sits on the edge of the bed. Martial watches the screen out of the corner of his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to find a coach. A real one. Someone who has me work on my takedowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foued?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foued doesn't know jackshit. Just jiu-jitsu and rap stuff. You need to ask Cousin. His guys must train somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Think so?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. And I'll need some time to train.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll talk with Alta Secu. We'll be able to work something out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Work it out how?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll have my company pay you and I'll bill them what you cost me. They'll keep paying you but now you'll work directly for me. You won't have to spend your nights there. There is some movement on the screen. He interrupts himself. Gray silhouettes cross the screen, open a door and disappear before coming back to cross the screen once again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the Mousquetaires. Martial rewinds and zooms in on some faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make a copy and you'll take it to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: owner. Ask for Steve at Security. He'll tell you what to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. RICHARD'S TRUCK. DAY Sam is on Richard's lap, a driving' the truck. He is in seventh heaven. In front of them, a man is running down the shoulder of the road.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look who it is! Go on, honk!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. ROAD. DAY The horn beeps. Out of breath, in a sweat, Ali looks back and sees Richard and Sam in the truck. They slow down and pull up to him. Richard lowers his window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to school. Want to come along? Ali shakes his head and continues jogging. The truck disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. NEW GYM. DAY This new gym is large, clean and light. In one corner there is a genuine ring, and on the other side, a piece of tatami. Ali is working out with Joao, a Brazilian in a kimono. They try out some foot-fist series. On the mat, Ali shadows and deconstructs Joao's gestures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. ANTIBES. STREET. DAY A street near the beach. The weekend is beginning. The streets are crowded. Ali is on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you? I can't see you. Where? He looks every which way until he sees her, a few feet away. She is standing upright, in a light pair of pants, with her canes hidden behind her back. It takes some time to register. She smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's fucking amazing! I was looking for a wheelchair...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop looking. No more wheelchairs!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since when?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could have told me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? Is it a problem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't know. You're like before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, not exactly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on, let's see. She takes a few steps forward, leaning on her canes. He whistles in admiration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to get my balance but supposedly that doesn't take long.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It must be like walking on stilts...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. I've never walked on stilts before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look taller. Does it hurt?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A little, but it feels good too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Want to go for a swim? She stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The beach... pff, I don't know... It's different today... I don't think I want to get undressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT - KITCHEN. DAY They are at the kitchen table, eating salad. Stephanie is in her wheelchair. Ali has finished his plate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this all you have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look in the fridge. There must be some cheese left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have any pate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't have any pate. He gets up and opens the fridge. He takes the cheese, sniffs it, then takes some yoghurt too. He notices a box of cereal on a shelf and takes it. He returns to the fridge for some milk. She watches, her mouth open in suspense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a good eater, aren't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hungry. He begins with the cheese.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No bread?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She shakes her head "no" and points to a box of biscuits on the shelf.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are crackers up there. Do you have a girlfriend? He shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have anyone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but they're not girlfriends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are they? Quick fucks?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. She hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lot? He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mind talking about this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't care. (pause) How about you? Did you have a lot of boyfriends?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When, before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was with Simon...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's all?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, there were others. But not a lot either. I... I wasn't very... In fact, I liked it when guys looked at me... I liked to feel that I turned them on... Afterwards, I don't know... they bored me. Ali looks at her, strangely attentive, as if he didn't understand, or didn't believe her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, nothing. I don't even know what it looks like anymore... I don't even know if it still works...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I say I didn't want to anymore? Of course I still want to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you go about it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you think I go about it? If I were a guy I'd say I jerk off to a porn video... I'm a girl. Ali is dumbstruck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, let's change the subject... She begins piling up plates and silverware.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to fuck? She is thrown for a loop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to know if it still works, so let's fuck and that way you'll know. He looks at her, simply, naturally. She has a nervous laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just like that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, yeah. Give me that. He takes the plates, gets up and puts them in the dishwasher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I don't know if I can like that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever you want... You tell me... She hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. She wheels herself away from the table and into the bedroom. He remains alone, quickly cleaning the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait! He waits. Then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT - BEDROOM. DAY He enters the room. The shutters are closed. She is in bed, under the covers. She watches him sit down on the bed, undo
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: his pants and turn toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay? Ready? Unsure of herself, she pulls a face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's try. He slips under the covers, spontaneously tries to kiss her, but she pushes him away gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a little nervous) Do you mind if we don't kiss?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Your breasts... can I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. He licks her breasts, then lies on top of her, covering her. She tries to wriggle herself free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're crushing me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you should stop talking now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I'll stop. His hands caress her, they grab onto what remains of her thighs. He enters her. She is about to scream, but lets herself go. She grabs hold of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gently!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT - KITCHEN. DAY Ali opens the fridge. He is dressed again. Stephanie appears in a robe, sitting in her wheelchair. We can tell she feels too shy to look at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you okay? How was it? She blushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it still working?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, yes... no... I don't really know. It's different... It's hard to tell after just one try...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah but I don't have time right now. I have to go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (blushing) No, no! That's not what I meant... I just meant that it's too soon to tell... like too many things are happening at once... Ali doesn't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But did you enjoy it or not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you're up for it and you can't find anyone, ask me. If I'm oper, we'll do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's "oper"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Operational... If I'm available. If I can, I mean!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're "oper" we...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. She sketches a vague gesture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Her throat is constricted, she is unable to answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. Great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. MARINELAND - STAFFROOM. DAY Stephanie uses one of her canes to push open the door to the staff room. The room is apparently empty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Louise? Louise, are you here? Is anyone here? No answer. She looks over the office she once knew so well and that hasn't seen again since her accident: the photos on the wall, the diagrams, the case histories, the animals' names, etc...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. MARINELAND - BLEACHERS. DAY Up in the bleachers, Stephanie looks over all the pools, the big one as well as the others... suddenly, in nA 3, a huge but limp black dorsal fin appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. POOL N3. DAY Weighed down by her prostheses, Stephanie has to lie down on the rim of pool nA 3 to reach the water. She reaches out and slaps the water with the palm of her hand. Nothing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: really happens, a black mass just keeps circling at the bottom of the pool... She slaps again and the black mass swims faster and faster... a wave is formed around the sides of the pool, a wave that swells higher and higher... Stephanie's hand again slaps the water and, suddenly, Niska emerges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. POOL N3 - DAY Niska washes up. Stephanie caresses her and weeps softly, like someone caught unawares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gently) Stephanie? Stephanie looks back to discover Louise and three other ex- colleagues. They have been there a moment, surprised, unsettled and ill at ease.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I stopped by the office but there wasn't anyone. Stephanie stands up with the help of her canes. The guys rush over to help her. They hug and kiss. All four remain like that for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. MARINELAND - CAFETERIA. DAY Sun and music. The public is beginning to invade the lanes and paths. Stephanie, Louise and the other keepers are on the terrace of the employees' cafeteria. They are thrilled and reassured to see her again. At times a hand touches her arm or shoulder. Sometimes an acquaintance comes over and kisses her. Under the table, Stephanie types a oper?' into her cell phone, then looks up and returns to her surroundings. We can imagine the "How are you?" "And you?" "Great". The "Let me get a look at you... You look wonderful!"...all a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bit strained, but friendly. Louise, who is sitting next to her, leans over to her:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) See? It wasn't hard! They smile at each other and return to the conversation in progress. Stephanie's cell phone vibrates on the table. She discreetly checks the answer, and when she looks up, exchanges a glance with Louise. From that glance, we cut to:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. SUPERMARKET. DAY Stephanie and Louise are out shopping. Stephanie holds herself up thanks to the shopping cart she is pushing. We join their conversation already in progress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I feel like it, I send him a text message and ask if he's oper. If he is, we hook up. Louise reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's oper?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he's up for it. If he's free. If he is, we fuck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that all?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's all. What else do you want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Is that enough?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For me it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does he do? Stephanie hesitates a moment, as if worried about how Louise will react.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He fights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind? MMA?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Illicit fights in the projects. Louise reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever I say, you make a face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give me a second to react... Are you in love? She hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He does me good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. PARKING LOT. MARINELAND. DAY The group of trainers has accompanied Stephanie to a taxi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TAXI/PARKING LOT - MARINELAND. DAY Stephanie waves good-bye. They return her wave. The taxi drives away. The group scatters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BASEMENT. DAY A dark cellar. We hear Ali and Stephanie labor and sigh. A door suddenly opens above and we hear voices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is it? He looks for his clothes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GARDEN. DAY ... then goes to the garden where he startles Anna:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know you were here. You scared me. What were you up to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was talking?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not alone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm with a friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bring girls back to my place now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a friend, I said. Just then, the basement door opens and Stephanie appears on her crutches. Anna is dismayed. Ali motions to Stephanie:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Stephanie) Let me introduce you to my sister! (to Anna) This is Stephanie. You know the girl from Marineland. Stephanie offers her hand to Anna who takes it, then realizing what she's doing, puts the other to her mouth:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God. Poor thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam arrives with his snack. Stephanie looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So that's him? They are sitting around the garden table. Anna comes carrying a tray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were out of grapefruit. I took tropical fruit. She puts some glasses and two tetra packs of fruit juice on the table. Through a hole in the oilcloth, Stephanie can watch Sam playing under the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll make tea. I have some cookies. You drink tea, don't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't bother. This is perfect, I swear. Thanks. Before Stephanie can even finish, Anna is already on the way back to the kitchen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't want to get going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, your sister...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You freak her out. Can't you see? She feels like a cashier with you. Pathetic with her tea and cookies. It's a pain. Stephanie leans on a cane to stand up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to help her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No need to overdo it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ANNA'S HOUSE. DAY Later, Sam guides Stephanie up the narrow stairs of the house. She has a hard time with her a legs' and canes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. SAM'S ROOM. DAY A child's room with cheap wall paper depicting dolphins. Stephanie is sitting on the edge of the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So this is where you sleep? It's a nice room. Sam nods in agreement. He gives her a strange look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you looking at me like that? Does it scare you? You want to see them, is that it? He nods. She lifts one of her pant legs to show the prosthesis underneath. Sam looks attentively, stretches out his hand, touches it carefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does it hurt? Stephanie smiles at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... Want to touch it? Sam reaches out his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MARTIAL'S CAR. DAY In CU through the tinted windows of Martial's Mercedes Vito: the face of a boxer who is lying on the ground and being pummeled. Ali is sitting bare-chested in the back seat, a towel around his neck and a bottle of water between his knees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ali watches the fight. Sitting next to him, Stephanie fills a plastic bag with ice cubes. She hands it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. He applies it to his eyebrow. She displaces a bloody strand of hair and replaces it with another. We see Martial return to the car and open the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay? He puts a wad of money in the glove compartment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready? Ali nods a yes'. He opens his door, gets half out and empties the bottle of water over his head. Stephanie is left alone in the car. She hears the spectators' cheers. She closes the window and turns on the air conditioning full blast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. PROJECTS - COURTYARD. DAY His opponent's guard is up, closed tighter than a safe. Behind his fists, Ali can see the guy's frozen stare. And then suddenly he breaks loose: a series of feints and a kick behind the ear. He hears himself growl, the light becomes electrifying. He is on the ground, protecting himself as best he can. He tries to block his opponent's arm. He hears himself wheezing and panting like a pair of bellows. He sees his blood splatter his opponent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... All of a sudden, in your mouth, it's like it tasted like bone. A taste of rust and bone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you think bone has a taste?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, there I did. Then, through the spectators' legs, he sees something: sunlight reflected off the Mercedes door that has just opened on a pair of shoes attached to two prostheses, a pair of shortsa He also sees the heads of the tough guys who turn back to look. He breaks free, struggles to his feet, spits up a clot of blood and returns to the task at hand. His opponent tries to get up. Ali jumps on him to finish
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MARTIAL'S CAR. DAY The car is driving back into town. Martial is driving. The windows are open. Ali holds a bag of ice against his cheek bone, while Stephanie applies her Band-Aids to a cut over his eyebrows. They are talking, but we can not hear what they say. All we hear is the noise of the wind against the open windows. Ali suddenly breaks out laughing. Martial does too in the rear view mirror. Stephanie follows suita
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MOUSQUETAIRES. DAY Muzak. Ali and Martial follow the head of security into the store. Some of the personnel are near the cash registers, silent, hostile and immobile. The morning customers wonder what's happening. The head of security elbows his way through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let them through, please! The personnel reluctantly make way.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: "A SPYING BOSS IS A CRIMINAL BOSS

direction.raw_text: . INT. MOUSQUETAIRES - STOCKROOM. DAY Red graffiti on the wall: "A SPYING BOSS IS A CRIMINAL BOSS!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ali recognizes the place with the palettes up to the ceiling. In the back, he also recognizes the manager, protected by two guards and being harangued by union representatives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Ali, pointing to the manager) Go get the equipment. I need to see him. Ali obeys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't bother. We're the ones who will call the police. The police and the press. That way they'll know you spy on your workers! The manager looks away, accompanied by his two guards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least have the courage to look at me when I talk to you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cameras, the ripped out cables, the phony boxes have been piled up on the floor. It looks more like the crime squad has been at work. Ali opens a garbage bag and bends over to retrieve the equipment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing there? She's a young employee in the store uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (suspicious) Packing up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it your stuff?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. He notices that she's taken out her cell phone to take a picture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you take a picture!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You work for them? She continues to manipulate her phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said no picture!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why shouldn't I? You film us! He straightens up menacingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to slap you! A hand grabs his arm. It's Martial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget it. Let's get out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the equipment?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget about it. We're fucked here. The cops are going to question the managers and the managers will turn us in. They leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MARTIAL'S FORMULE 1 ROOM. NIGHT Martial's fingers slowly play with the hair on his chest. He is lying nude on the bed of his Formule 1 hotel room. He smokes and stares at the ceiling. His suitcases and bags are packed, all he has to do is close them. He hears knocks next door. He gets up with a sigh, pulls on his pants and opens the door. Stephanie is waiting in front of room 429.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In here. Stephanie looks back, surprised. Martial motions her in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to go away for work. 3 or 4 months, I don't know yet... Since Ali wants to keep fighting, I thought maybe you tend to that while I'm not here... She is thunderstruck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he okay with that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's the one who asked me to call you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess he trusts you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs, thrown for a loop) Yes, sure but.... I don't know anything about that scene... I don't know those guys! He hands her an old spiral notebook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wrote it all down here. As for the rest, ask me your questions and I'll answer them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I do the bets?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can count on your fingers, can't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honestly, can you see me dealing with those beasts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you need money to cover the bets, and you have money. She looks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? You're not rich? What did the insurance company give you for your legs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ? 300,000? Those jobs must have good health plans. Am I wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. A shadow crosses Stephanie's mind. She looks at the open bags and suitcases, without really seeing them. The place looks like it's expecting a police raid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grenoble, then Vienne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Austria?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, in the IsA re.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was the insurance money your idea?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. A beat. He gives her time to wrap her head around that one. Then, since she still looks troubled, he taps her on the hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me, I said. Don't worry. I'm the bad guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. FEVER RAY. NIGHT Through the door of the club, we hear snatches of the introduction to Thunderstruck. People are sweating and trying to get into the Fever. Foued lets Martial, Ali, Stephanie and Khadi through. Virile bear hugs and handshakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Cousin's waiting for you inside. Table to the left of the bar. Ali knows and greets everyone. Stephanie is in the middle of the group. She holds herself up on the shoulders of these big, caring guys and lets herself be carried along. She feels good
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. FEVER RAY. NIGHT The club is hot as a steam bath. Loud music blares out of loudspeakers. Bodies dance and eyes shine bright. At the table "left of the bar": Cousin and three friends who are with him. Another round of bear hugs and handshakes. Martial, Stephanie and Cousin regroup face to face. Martial speaks, Cousin listens and at times looks over at Stephanie, who looks at him too. She notices one of the tattoos on his arm: a green and red snake that seems to be slithering out his sleeve. The barman brings two bottles of champagne. Ali leans toward her:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Want to boogie? She doesn't understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loud) You want to dance?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She looks frightened, but then smiles when she sees what he's up to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever you say. He goes to the dance floor and begins to rock. He dances badly, clumsily. Martial pours champagne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. FEVER RAY. NIGHT The smoking area is located outside, and a bit farther off, the dope smoking area. Behind the smokers, we hear noise from the club. Cousin is puffing on a spliff. Stephanie watches, holding her champagne goblet. He offers it to her. She accepts and takes a drag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I talk to you? She nods "yes".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's something I'd like to know... The fish that ate your legs... She wasn't expecting that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it true it's still there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah... where else would it be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They didn't shoot it? Or put it down, whatever?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would they do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... when a dog attacks you, they kill it. And the fish gets off. Don't you mind that the thing that ate your legs is living it up in its shitty fucking aquarium?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. And I don't want anything to happen to it. Now more than ever! He looks at her, incredulous, but with admiration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (imitating her) "Now more than ever". Listen to you! He takes another drag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (imitating her) Tututu-tu-tutu... They laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I sound like that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tututu...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. FEVER RAY. NIGHT We are back inside. Ali is working on a girl a bit farther off on the dance floor. Stephanie follows Cousin through the noise and sticky heat. When she next looks at the dance floor, Ali is no longer there. Ali and the girl are on their way to the exit. Ali looks for a friendly face, meets Stephanie's glance and motions that he's leaving. She waves: "Yeah, ok, I get it." Ali disappears with the girl. Stephanie is at the bar, drinking. She types an SMS into her cell phone: "operational?" She hesitates, then puts
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: away her cell phone. She hadn't noticed a guy sitting next to her. She also failed to notice that he's been speaking to her for a while now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loud) Huh? I can't hear you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loud) No problem. What are you drinking?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (loud) Champagne? The guy orders. He is blond, lean and athletic-looking. He might be thought to resemble Simon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name? I'm Pierre.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey there. I'm Marie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come here often? Stephanie is on automatic pilot. When she turns to the room, she feels the blond guy's eyes locked onto her. She can pretty much tell what he's thinking about the breasts under her T-shirt. She answers his questions, she returns his smiles. When she finishes her glass and puts it down on the counter, he kisses her. She doesn't push him away immediately, like a frightened virgin, she takes the time to put a good face on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... No, please. I don't feel like it. Not tonight. I can't... The guy looks disappointed, then manages a a good loser's' smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, no problem...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's best I go. Good night and thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He sees her lean over to retrieve her canes and then hobble away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. I couldn't know. Stephanie freezes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't know what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't know what, asshole? Foued runs to warn Martial, Khadi and Cousin that something is wrong. When Martial arrives, he sees Stephanie collared by a bouncer three times her size. She lashes out with one of her canes, while under the bar, another bouncer tries to help the blond guy back to his feet. There's a deep gash on his skull. Cousin comes to give the bouncer a hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. ANTIBES - BEACH -CAFA. DAY Early morning. The shrill screech of the sea gulls and the milky light of a day that looks like it's going to be sunless. Stephanie drinks her coffee at the only table on the terrace. Behind her, chairs are still piled up and the waiter is slowly getting to work. A silhouette appears on the sidewalk. It's Ali, in the same clothes as last night. He joins her and takes a seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you stay late?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't remember. Afterwards the cousin took us to a club at la Colle sur Loup... It sucked and it was 5 a.m. And you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Normal. (to the waiter) A large coffee with milk and bread with butter! A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think it's good that we're having this conversation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What conversation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That I ask how it was with the girl last night and you answer normal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want me to say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. He grimaces at her mood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh la!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Oh la" what? You think it's normal leaving with that bimbo in front of me? What would you say if I did the same thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah? You wouldn't care?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're pissing me off. What's your problem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, let me put it differently. What I am for you? A friend? A pal? Sort of a buddy, like Foued and the others?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell me something: do you and your buddies fuck every now and then? He snickers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No? Really? Never? That's the difference. Her looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dammit, stop looking at me that way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How am I looking at you? The waiter arrives with Ali's order. She tones her voice down a notch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You wanted us to continue... Isn't that what you told Martial?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about, fucking or fighting?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we have to go about it well. We have to show each other manners, and consideration...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Manners?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Stop acting like an idiot. Do the words bother you? You know what I mean.... Tact... You've never stopped being tactful with me. A beat. He looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So... is that a plan? She waits for his mind to come back before continuing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll continue... but not like animals. He smirks, with a flick of the chin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cat got your tongue? Ali stirs his cup without answering. He feels her eyes on him. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm oper now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You made me oper. It's you! It's because it's all you're talking about!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) You are really a dog. He stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm getting out of here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm fed up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're bored?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I'm saying bores you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you acting like a jackass on purpose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you being an ass by putting words everywhere? He sits back down. She watches him eat his sandwiches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the one who's leaving. She gets up. Ali finishes his coffee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TATTOO PARLOR. DAY The buzz of a small electric compressor. In extreme close up: the needle of a tattoo machine pricking skin. Ink flows, a cotton swab wipes... a tattoo slowly appears. Lying on a table, Stephanie is having what remains of her legs tattooed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT/INT. BANK. DAY Stephanie is at a teller's window, withdrawing a rather large amount of cash. A machine counts out the bills, while the employee stuffs wads of them into an envelope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT/INT USED CAR DEALERSHIP. DAY Pennants flap in the wind, the pennants of a used car dealership.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : car doors opening, automatic gearboxes, Stephanie's "feet" testing pedals, bucket seats, backseats, tinted windows opening and closing, etc.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. PROJECTS - APARTMENT. DAY A painting of a lion hunt and, under it, Stephanie and Cousin on a couch, talking shop. Leaning over a computer and a cell phone, they go over potential adversaries. Some kids stick their heads in to see what Stephanie looks like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. NEW GYM. DAY Foued, wearing protective gear, spars with a black cruiserweight. The fight is close, the sound of flesh on flesh resounds. Outside the ring, Ali cheers Foued on. He notices on the other side of the ring a young thin, bearded guy in a Lacoste polo shirt buttoned up to his neck - Leonardini - who is following the fight with the eye of a pro. When Ali and Joao are later working out on their bit of tatami, Ali sees Foued sitting on a bench, with a towel around his neck and talking with Leonardini.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He saw me at la Ciotat. We spoke a few times on the phone. When he has it in for you, he never lets up. Leonardini is well-known.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was a club in Strasbourg with a training center. He's taking me on a trial basis for three months. If it works out, he'll make challenger in the nationals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. LOCKER ROOM - NEW GYM. DAY Ali and Foued are off to one side in the locker room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So are you going to Strasbourg?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think? I'd be an idiot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And when are you leaving? Leonardini enters the locker room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Leonardini, this is my buddy Ali. Ali Van Versh. Leonardini shakes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pleased to meet you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. PROJECTS - COURTYARD. DAY Through the tinted windshield of a Nissan Pathfinder SUV, Ali watches Stephanie, wearing a tight T shirt and leaning on her cane, talking with Cousin and some bettors. The discussion looks intense. Stephanie returns to the car. Below her pedal pushers, her prostheses sparkle in the sunlight. We hear salacious jibes from the surrounding buildings. She opens the car door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much is there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Are you ready? Walking with a slow, deliberate sway - aware of the effect she's having - she ceremonially opens the passenger door. The remarks cease.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT. NIGHT / DAWN CU: a black and red arrow with, in industrial characters:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . It's the tattoo on Stephanie's right thigh. Ali's hand grips and squeezes the thigh. They are making love. The room is half-lit. Ali growls and grinds his teeth in his sleep. Stephanie slowly and noiselessly rolls over to her side of the bed. She gets up and, using her hands, drags herself toward the bathroom. Suddenly, feeling like he's suffocating, Ali awakens. It takes a few seconds for him to realize where he is. His hand sweeps across the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. He sits up. She is embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, don't look!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to pee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it early?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit, I collapsed... Ali slips out of bed, naked, yawning and groggy. He comes and leans over her...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't like it when you see me like this...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on. She hangs onto his neck. He lifts her up and, both naked, he carries her into the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT - BATHROOM. DAWN Stephanie is sitting on the toilet, while Ali pees in the shower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I called the numbers they gave me at the gym. I spoke to an organizer, GA14nther Bower. She yawns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a gala in Turin next week. He told me that we'd have time to meet there. I'm going to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. And when do I see him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Later, in his gym in Dortmund. He wants to organize a test match, to see what you're worth. To see if you've got the "GAttlicher Zorn""... Ali comes out of the shower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn on the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn on the water when you pee. It's disgusting. He runs some water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STEPHANIE'S APARTMENT. DAWN He carries her back into the bedroom. She looks at his face, the scar on his forehead, the scar over his nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's your nose?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It doesn't seem broken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. They look at each other. He puts her down on the bed and lies down next to her. Stephanie slides over to him. He lifts her up and places her on her stomach. They remain like that, without moving. She looks like a mermaid lolling on a rock. She leans over and kisses him on the mouth. He pulls away, surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now we're allowed? No answer. They make love. In CU: the tattoo on Stephanie's left thigh. A red and black arrow with, in industrial characters: "LEFT".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT/INT. NISSAN SUV. DAY Music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The road speeds by. Sun. Road signs with the names of Italian cities. The landscape has changed. Wearing her baseball cap and sunglasses, Stephanie drives with her elbow out the window. On the radio, we hear the voice of an Italian DJ.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. COASTAL ROAD. DAY Ali jogs along the sea shore. He sweats, huffing and puffing. He stops, takes a few steps, then continues, but soon stops again. It looks as if his feet are weighing him down. Traffic speeds by. He stands still and stares into the near distance. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TURIN - HOTEL. EVENING A standard hotel lobby. Curious, Stephanie looks at the crowd of fighters the day before the a Ultimate' tournament: muscle-bound giants squeezed into tight jackets, with bashed in eyebrows, collapsed nostrils, cauliflower ears... Every language can be heard, some greet each other, some hug, they all size each other up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Propped up on her cane, she heads for a table in a corner of the bar where a man is consulting his cell phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Mr. Bower?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) I'm Stephanie Granget. GA14nther looks about fifty and has obviously spent many of those years in the ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Settled in a corner in front of their open PCs, Stephanie and GA14nther talk shop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are about to separate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Can you get me a ticket for tonight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) I don't know. I'll see what I can do. (pointing to her legs) What happened to your legs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An accident. In another life. I was an animal trainer. I worked with orcas... The show took a turn for the worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (it dawns on him) Oh, of course! In France! The accident! It was you?! I'm talking to a star! Stephanie makes a face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I am... Amazing. What courage! Bravo! I'm very honored, really. I was an idiot before!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I acted like an arrogant business man. I'm so ashamed. Will you forgive me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course, Mr. Bower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call me GA14nther. Of course you can come tonight. As my guest!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TURIN - GYM. NIGHT Bleachers have been set up in a gym, surrounding a cage- like, fenced-in ring. Inside, combatants fight, no rules, no holds barred. On the floor, two wrestlers clasp and elbow each other. One is bleeding from the forehead. Below the ring, Stephanie is mesmerized by this carnival of violence. GA14nther leans toward her:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Funny, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) What? That?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That... and you!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR. NIGHT Stephanie walks down a corridor. She stops in front of a door and knocks. GA14nther opens. He looks surprised. He is barefoot, in a pair of trousers and an unbuttoned shirt. He looks at her inquisitively, and when she still doesn't
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Are you okay? Do you need anything? She hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) I... I came to see if I got it wrong, or not. He knits his brow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Got what wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) You don't understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) Excuse me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) I got the impression, the way you were looking at me before... Try to understand because this is getting hard for me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) No, you didn't get it wrong. He smiles and opens the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in German) I have someone in my life, you know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So do I. He draws her inside. The door closes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. SUPERMARKET. DAY Anna is about to open her cash register, when a West Indian in a security uniform whispers into her ear, apparently asking her to follow him. Another cashier is already waiting to take her place. Anna joins three other employees waiting in a corridor. They exchange a few words under their breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. SUPERMARKET - CORRIDOR - ADMINISTRATION. DAY Anna comes out of an office, looking distraught. She has to lean against the wall to hold herself up. A colleague comes to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got fired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. There's something we want to show you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the locker room, we recognize the girl who had photographed Ali while he was trying to reclaim Martial's camera equipment. The girl says something to Anna. When it seems that Anna can not believe her ears, the girl takes out her cell phone and confronts her with the evidence. Anna needs to sit down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. HOUSE. DAY Out of breath, Ali pushes open the gate and climbs the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. KITCHEN. DAY In the kitchen, Anna and Richard are sitting at the table in front of a meal they haven't had the appetite to start.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You okay? No answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't seem it. He goes to open the fridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Close it! Don't eat here. Ali stares at her, stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't eat here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell is going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was fired this morning. I'm unemployed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit... But what's the problem if I eat here? Anna stands up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They had cameras in the storeroom... They filmed us when we took the expired food. They fired us. Ali's head spins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had your sister fired. How does it feel? How much did you get for that? You get paid per person or a flat rate? Nothing to say? I take you in, I take care of your son and you have nothing to say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You couldn't know? You couldn't know what? That you were screwing us out of jobs? That you were hurting people? Ali tries to find something to say, but his sister's hand delivers a resounding slap. He takes it like a man. A moment passes. Ali is red from the slap, red with shamea until he suddenly straightens up and knocks over the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Calm down. Calm down, I said! Ali looks back. He sees Richard's grim face at the other end of a hunting rifle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take your stuff and get out of here. We don't want to see you around here anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A sudden noise draws their attention: Sam is watching from the top of the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go to your room. Go upstairs immediately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ANNA'S HOUSE - BASEMENT. DAY An SMS arrives from Stephanie: aAlmost there. I miss you.a Ali is lying on his mattress. He puts down the phone. He hears Anna and Richard's voices upstairs. He sits up and begins to stuff things into a bag. A new message arrives: aI'm home. Oper?a Ali hesitates, then turns off his phone and clicks his bag closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ANNA'S HOUSE - SAM'S ROOM. EVENING Night has fallen. Sam's nose is stuck to his bedroom window. He sees his aunt sitting at the plastic table in the garden downstairs with her face in her hands. A door slams. Sam rushes to the bathroom window. He sees his father stomp down the street, never once looking back. Sam remains glued to the window pane. Ali's silhouette moves through the halo of a streetlight before again disappearing into the dark. Sam watches him for as far as he can. Fade to black.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT/ EXT. BASEMENT. DAY In the half-light of the basement, a rectangle of light has formed where the door opens onto the street. Stephanie looks over Ali's mess: his magazines, body building equipment, dirty T-shirts, track suits hanging over a trestle... Anna is standing against the light at the door and, a bit farther off, Sam is sitting on the stairs watching them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In his message he said he was in Strasbourg. No news since. I don't know what he's doing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: there, or even if he's still there. Has he called you? She shakes her head "no".
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you try the gym?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. They don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I had an address or a number, I'd give it to you... Even if I think it's dumb. Do you believe me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After what he did to me... Sam sees Stephanie join Anna near the door. She's about to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He abandoned his kid. He doesn't give a fuck about anything. All he ever cared about was himself. He's totally selfish. Sam watches the two women swallowed up by the light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? What did you expect with him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Not this. Fade to black. Black.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. ALSATIAN COUNTRYSIDE. MORNING A frosty landscape with trees that look like they've been engraved in ink... A group of twelve joggers in blue track suits run across a landscape of gray sky and snow. Some shadowbox while running. Ali is wearing a wool cap pulled down around his ears. He runs alongside Foued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. HOLIDAY VILLAGE. GYM. DAY A ring has been set up in the middle of the gym. A few guys have gathered round to watch Ali rhythmically pound on his trainer's bear-like paws. Leonardini sets the pace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... 1,2,3,4... Faster! 1,2,3. Yes. Faster! Move! You're stepping back! Ali pounds harder and harder. He times his respiration to match the movement of his fists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. HOLIDAY VILLAGE REC ROOM. EVENING Young athletes, some tall, some short, some heavyset, some not, are sitting on refectory chairs to watch TV. Ali does too. His hair is cut short and his face is closely shaven. He looks younger. He could be a student.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. RICHARD'S TRUCK. NIGHT/DAY A truck rushes headlong through the countryside. First it is day, then night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. HOLIDAY VILLAGE. DAY Through the window, Ali sees a twelve-ton Scania pull to a stop at the entrance to the parking lot and beep its horn. Ali runs out to meet it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. HOLIDAY VILLAGE - PARKING LOT. DAY Richard lowers his window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't come in any further or I won't be able to get back out! Ali checks out the huge semi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like you changed trucks!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bosses, in fact. I'm back to being exploited. Ali doesn't insist. Richard opens his door to let out Sam who is already trampling him, trying to get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Sam) Got everything? Your bag, your coat, your hat, your mittens? You haven't forgotten anything? Now give me a kiss. Sam gives him a kiss. Richard slips him out and into Ali's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are things there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My sister?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She found a job at a school cafeteria. She seems to enjoy it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does she know about today?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. She says it's good for the kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell her I can't help out for the time being but that as soon as I have a little money...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry. When's your fight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Next month. On the 9th. Richard smiles admiringly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep us posted if you win.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure I will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, right... Okay, I'm off. I'll deliver my load in Colmar and pick up the kid at around 7, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No later, because I have to be back tomorrow at 11. The two men say good-bye. Sam waves good-bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. ALSATIAN COUNTRYSIDE. DAY A path runs through fields and into a clump of fir trees. Ali pulls a plastic sled with Sam on top. Whenever there is a slope, he lets Sam glide down it and runs after him. Snow falls from the trees. He looks up and sees a couple of squirrels jump from branch to branch. Sam has never seen any before. Ali neither. Sunlight filters through the branches. A group of cross- country skiers trudges by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to skate too!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're not skating. They're skiing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, they're skating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're skiing, I said!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skating. A few steps on:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skiing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're annoying me. They take a break at a picnic area, where they eat some sandwiches and drink orange soda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (his mouth full) Does Auntie still have dogs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, now it's chickens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the garden?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, in the cage. They lay eggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Auntie doesn't want me to take the chicks in my room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's right. They're disgusting. (pointing to his sandwich) Finished? You want some
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: applesauce? Afternoon. On the way back, they find a frozen pond. Ali carefully advances on the ice. He tests it. Jumps on it. Then he lets himself go and glides across the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can go. But not too far! Sam starts slipping and sliding. He falls down. He lies on the sled and lets it glide. Ali pees behind a tree. Sam is far away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, we have to head back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 5 minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (showing his fingers) 5 minutes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 5 minutes. And then suddenly, instead of gliding, the child sinks. He tries to climb out and sinks again. A thin layer of ice is forming over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daddy! Daddy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit! Ali rushes to the pond, but Sam is already iced over. He kneels down and then crawls on his stomach toward the hole. Sam has disappeared. Ali shoves aside snow. He looks everywhere, but sees nothing. And then he hears a noise, blows like signals coming from under the ice. Ali crawls
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: over and clears away snow as best he can. Under the ice, he sees Sam's face, staring wide-eyed. Ali begins to pound both his fists on the ice, like pistons or pestles... As if pounding on his punching bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . UNDER THE ICE. DAY Underwater, we hear the sound of dull thuds. Sam sees his father's fists pound on the ice. He sees bloodstains. The ice cracks, a bloody fist searches the water for him. Sam closes his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. POND. EVENING Evening is falling. Ali has stretched Sam out on the rim of the pond. The child has turned blue. He tries mouth-to- mouth resuscitation, he massages his heart and rubs him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. COUNTRY ROAD. EVENING Ali's respiration has become a grunt, then a groan. He runs. He has stowed Sam behind the front of his parka and runs as fast as he can. He slips, gets back up and runs again... he again breathes into Sam's mouth... while still running...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. STRASBOURG - HOSPITAL - ICU. DAY Leaning against the window of the Intensive Care Unit, Ali sees Sam's nude, tiny body being worked on by doctors... his skin is blue from the cold... there is a tube in his mouth... his ribs rise and fall to the rhythm of a respirator... his mouth spits out brackish water brutally... A door opens and a nurse appears. Ali straightens up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll take care of you. Come with me. He doesn't understand. Then he notices the blood prints his hands have left on the ICU window. He looks at his scarred fingers, his broken, bloodied hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. SAM'S HOSPITAL ROOM. EVENING Sam is lying in a hospital bed. His eyes are closed and coils of tubes attach him to control apparatus. Ali is at his side. His hands are now wrapped in thick bandages. The disinfectant makes him look like he is wearing yellow gloves halfway up his arms. Richard is standing behind him, near the window. Ali takes Sam's fingers, places them in the palm of his bandaged hand and looks at them. Sam's eyes begin to dart wildly under his eyelids... his fingers quiver... his eyes open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. HOSPITAL - CORRIDOR. NIGHT There are not many people in the corridor at this late hour. Richard is bent over a coffee machine. A cup slowly fills up. Farther off, Ali is KO, leaning against a wall. Richard brings him a coffee. Ali takes it clumsily into his damaged hands. Richard's cell phone rings. He moves away to answer and speaks into it softly. A few moments later, he returns to Ali and hands him the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here. She wants to talk to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna? Richard shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me. (pause) Do you mind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. He woke up an hour ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he injured?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I fucked up my hands on the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it serious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're broken. A beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you up to?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean in general? In my life?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted to say that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not asking for anything. I'll be going. I'll call you back to see how Sam's doing. Give him a kiss him from me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't hang up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't hang up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't hang up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was in a coma for 3 hours... Three hours... For three hours he was dead... I was scared to lose him. His eyes well with tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't leave me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't leave you. Black.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you.
direction.name: direction
